name: list_replies_by_comment
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tiktok_private.
Tool description: Fastest,  Highly Maintained TikTok API,  Build For Massive TikTok Scraping. Get TikTok User Profile, Post, Feed, Trends, Hashtags, Music and Download Video Without Watermark.
API description: Fetches replies to a specific comment on a given TikTok video using the RapidAPI service.

aweme_id.description: The ID of the TikTok video.

comment_id.description: The ID of the comment for which replies are being retrieved.

count.description: The number of replies to retrieve. Defaults to 10.

cursor.description: The starting point for pagination. Defaults to 0.

proxy.description: Proxy server to use for the request. Defaults to None.
